sentence.Network_en: Campaigners lit scores of bonfires in ceremonies to mark the anniversary.
sentence.Network_cn: 参加运动的人们在各种仪式上点起一垛垛篝火以纪念周年庆典。

sentence.Network_en: The Vietnamese government has fixed on May 19th to celebrate his anniversary.
sentence.Network_cn: 越南政府已经决定于5月19日庆祝他的诞辰。

sentence.Network_en: It was the fortieth anniversary of the death of the composer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是该作曲家逝世40周年纪念日。

石油英语词汇(A4) ... annite 铁云母 anniversary wind 季节风 anniversary 周年纪念；周年的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Latin anniversarius 'returning yearly', from annus 'year' + versus 'turning'

entry.def: An anniversary is a date which is remembered or celebrated because a special event happened on that date in a previous year.

example.ex: ...the one hundredth anniversary of the birth of Ho Chi Minh.
example.tran: 胡志明诞辰一百周年纪念

means.word_mean: 1. the date on which an event occurred in some previous year (or the celebration of it)

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Romney does a better job with the anniversary reference.

auth_sentence.content: The anniversary concert was a sentimental and musical success.
auth_sentence.res_content: The anniversary concert was a sentimental and musical success.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The anniversary concert was a sentimental and musical success.

auth_sentence.content: It was the Pangs' fourth wedding anniversary.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was the Pangs' fourth wedding anniversary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was the Pangs' fourth wedding anniversary.

a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的

in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的

adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐

diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用

perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为

uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能

vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

ann年,一年+ual……的→adj.一年一度的
bi两+ann年+ual……的→一年两次的

ann年,一年+al状态+s→一年状态的综合→纪年表,年鉴,年报

sentences.en: Today is my parents' 30th wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 今天是我父母结婚30周年纪念日。

jushi.english: I gave him a handsome present at the anniversary of his birthday.
jushi.chinese: 在他生日那天我送给他一份很好的礼物。

jushi.english: Today is my parents' 30th wedding anniversary.
jushi.chinese: 今天是我父母结婚30周年纪念日。

jushi.english: For an anniversary present Stuart took me to the opera and we had seats in the dress circle.
jushi.chinese: 作为一种周年纪念礼物,史都华带我去听歌剧,我们的座位就在二楼的前排。
